definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Welding and electron microscopy are two different branch of science subjects.
sentences.chinese: 焊接和電子顯微學是兩門不同的學科。

sentences.english: This chapter briefly reviews the evolution of in-situ electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先簡單回顧了原位電子顯微學的發展歷史。

sentences.english: It is significant for quantitative research of electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 這對電子顯微學的定量研究是很有意義的。

sentences.english: Electron microscopy has revolutionized the study of crystal imperfections .
sentences.chinese: 電子顯微學已經革新了對晶體不完整性的研究。
